reviews.title: Nice quality but too dark to be called Espresso
reviews.review_text: I liked everything about this TV stand except the color. We chose expressing but when it arrived it was so dark it looked almost black. On the picture expresso looked like a dark brown which would have matched My Moms living room furniture so I was a little disappointed how dark it ended up being. I think the colors were slightly off with the names/pictures of each color so ordering the lighter color may have been just what we needed.

reviews.title: Straight to the Point.
reviews.review_text: It's nice but when it was finished being put together the top part was not secure so when moved it CANNOT be carried by the top part but the Bottom Only. Also one side of the top doesn't fit perfectly to the rest of the stand there is a 1mm space in between in which is not present on the other side. There are alot of steps to putting it together but it can be done. Other than these 2 issues it is nice looking tv stand and sits a 50 inch on it well.

reviews.title: You get what you pay for so just don't expect much
reviews.review_text: Overall I am not completely disappointed as the stand does serve the purpose of being a place to stand our television on. The quality is ok very delicate though. I did not like the legs on the bottom. Should be a easier way to put them on. Or it would be best if assembly for the legs would not be required. The legs are not even so the stand wobbles. It isn't too big which does make it a great size for our small cozy living room.

reviews.title: You get what you pay for
reviews.review_text: You get what you pay for- dont expect perfection, its a mass produced product made to sell not last.
The Color is too dark, looks black. I order Espresso. The quality is good for the price.

reviews.title: Scratched wood of tv stand
reviews.review_text: After assembling this tv stand , i realized there is a large scratch in the wood in the top piece

reviews.title: should be priced around $49.99
reviews.review_text: ok but should be less expensive
Instructions can be a little clearer either tightening the inside screws
I don't buy Walmart for high quality but it's cheaper stuff to just get the job done

reviews.title: Mainstay tv stand
reviews.review_text: The stand just to short for a bedroom otherwise great stand
